metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6111 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: linux netfilter: the expired catchall element is not deactivated and removed from GC sync path.

criterions.comment: linux package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
